Package dao

Class AbstractDAO<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.AbstractDAO<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Defines the current type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientDAO, InvoiceDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
    public class AbstractDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to make the connection between the DB and Application
